name: Monkey Bridge
description:
Description
Navigate your jumping monkey over obstacles and bridges and overcome its arch nemesis... gravity.

Submission for the 2021 Free Lives Physics Game Jam

Controls
Left, Right, Up, Down arrow keys

Credits
Christopher Golden - Art and Music
Daniel Holmes - Development
Nickolas Grigoriadis - Development
